briefTitle: AZD0585 Phase III Long-term Study in Japan
officialTitle: A Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo Controlled, Parallel Group, Phase III Long-term Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of 12 Weeks and 52 Weeks of AZD0585 Administration, Respectively, in Japanese Patients With Hyperlipidemia Accompanied by Hypertriglyceridemia.
summary: This study is a randomised, double-blind phase III long-term study to evaluate efficacy and safety of 12 weeks and 52 weeks of AZD0585 administration compared to placebo in patients with hyperlipidemia accompanied by hypertriglyceridemia .

primaryOutcome.measure: Efficacy of AZD0585 by Assessment of Percent Change in Serum Triglycerides
